name: Just One Minute, Mom!
description:
JOMM, short for “Just one minute, Mom!” is in its core a short boss fighting game with roguelike elements. The player fights against an unusual computer virus, which has the power to escape the computer and its goal is to conquer the earth with its glitchy powers of ads, popups, and hacks. It is set in the year 2007 and the player gets to take control over a teenager in their room to defeat the virus.


Team JUMMY: Jan, Imke, Alex & Denis
Soundies: Joan & Maja

This game was created as a Semester Project at the University of Applied Sciences, Darmstadt, Faculty of Media.
